name:
Fire Emblem Warriors
Update Ver. 1.5.0
description: This is an update for the game card version of the Fire Emblem Warriors game. This download does not contain the full version of the title. In order to use this update, you must have the full game card version of Fire Emblem Warriors.
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
